sources.title: Rumors (1943)
sources.description: Rumors is part of the Private Snafu series of animated shorts produced by Warner Bros. during World War II. Released in 1943, the cartoon was directed by Friz Freleng. Watch on RetroFlix.org:Â  https://retroflix.org/rumors-1943/

metadata.Plot: Snafu inadvertantly starts a panic on his base when he begins a mistaken rumour that the base is about to be bombed.
metadata.Actors: Mel Blanc, Frank Graham, Michael Maltese
